package m_test

import "testing"

func TestFoo(t *testing.T) {
	t.Run("bar", func(t *testing.T) {
	})
	t.Run("baz", func(t *testing.T) {
		t.Skip("some reason")
	})
	t.Run("legit failure", func(t *testing.T) {
		t.Errorf("an error")
	})
}
